expectation of return; similarly, those who help without expecting return are not those who help with expectation."},{"kural number": 212, "english mk translation": "The wealth one accumulates should be used to benefit the deserving."},{"kural number": 213, "english mk translation": "It is rare to find a virtue greater than 'oppuravu' (benevolence/social responsibility) in this world or the next."},{"kural number": 214, "english mk translation": "One who understands benevolence and lives accordingly is considered truly alive; otherwise, they are considered dead."},{"kural number": 215, "english mk translation": "The wealth of a wise person who lives for the common good is like a well-filled water tank that benefits everyone in the village."},{"kural number": 216, "english mk translation": "If wealth accumulates in the hands of a compassionate person, it is like a flourishing tree in the middle of a village, bearing fruit for all."},{"kural number": 217, "english mk translation": "If wealth comes to one who practices benevolence, it is like all parts of a good tree being useful as medicine."},{"kural number": 218, "english mk translation": "Those who remain steadfast in benevolence even when their wealth diminishes and poverty strikes are individuals of duty."},{"kural number": 219, "english mk translation": "The true sign that a benevolent person has become poor is their inability to help others."},{"kural number": 220, "english mk translation": "If the benevolent practice of helping others leads to harm, that harm is worth buying back even by selling oneself."},{"kural number": 221, "english mk translation": "Generosity is giving to the needy; giving to others is often done with expectation of return."},{"kural number": 222, "english mk translation": "Receiving wealth virtuously is not glory, but disgrace. Giving generously may not lead to heaven, but it is the best way to live."},{"kural number": 223, "english mk translation": "It is the characteristic of the noble to give even when facing poverty, without revealing their hardship."},{"kural number": 224, "english mk translation": "For the generous, even pitying the supplicant who comes to them feels like suffering until they see the supplicant's smiling face."},{"kural number": 225, "english mk translation": "Giving food to the hungry is better than fasting by enduring hunger."},{"kural number": 226, "english mk translation": "Fulfilling the hunger of those who come saying they are starving is not in vain; it is a treasure saved for future help."},{"kural number": 227, "english mk translation": "The cruel disease of hunger does not approach those who practice sharing."},{"kural number": 228, "english mk translation": "Those who hoard wealth without giving anything to the poor, do they not know the joy of giving?"},{"kural number": 229, "english mk translation": "Consuming all that is hoarded, fearing that giving will diminish it, is worse than begging."},{"kural number": 230, "english mk translation": "The mental anguish of being unable to give anything to the poor is greater than the suffering of death."},{"kural number": 231, "english mk translation": "Other than generosity and enduring fame, nothing else brings prosperity to life."},{"kural number": 232, "english mk translation": "All that is praised by the praisers is the fame of those who give to the needy."},{"kural number": 233, "english mk translation": "Nothing endures in this world as imperishable as fame."},{"kural number": 234, "english mk translation": "Even the future world will not only praise those who have gained fame by renouncing selfishness in this world, but also those with knowledge and ability."},{"kural number": 235, "english mk translation": "It is the natural strength of the capable to enhance their fame even amidst suffering, and to establish their fame even in death."},{"kural number": 236, "english mk translation": "One should strive for fame in whatever field they engage; those who cannot achieve it are better off not engaging in it."},{"kural number": 237, "english mk translation": "Those who cannot live with true fame should lament their own actions, not those who criticize them."},{"kural number": 238, "english mk translation": "If one does not achieve fame that endures after death, the world will call it a disgrace to their life."},{"kural number": 239, "english mk translation": "If this earth bears mere human bodies without fame, it will be considered barren land."},{"kural number": 240, "english mk translation": "Living without blame is called life; the life of one without fame is no different from death."},{"kural number": 241, "english mk translation": "Even if wicked people possess immense wealth, it is not equal to the wealth of compassion."},{"kural number": 242, "english mk translation": "After examining all paths, compassion is the only virtue that truly supports life."},{"kural number": 243, "english mk translation": "Those with compassionate hearts will not wander in the dark world of ignorance."},{"kural number": 244, "english mk translation": "The wise who consider it their duty to show compassion and protect all beings will not worry about their own lives."},{"kural number": 245, "english mk translation": "The great world, driven by the wind, serves as proof that one can act without feeling suffering, through the impulse of compassion."},{"kural number": 246, "english mk translation": "Those who live wickedly without compassion will become poor and forgetful."},{"kural number": 247, "english mk translation": "Household life is not glorious for the poor; similarly, ascetic life is not glorious for the uncompassionate."},{"kural number": 248, "english mk translation": "One who loses wealth can regain it; but one who loses compassion cannot regain it."},{"kural number": 249, "english mk translation": "Can one without clear intellect understand the true meaning of a scripture? Similarly, the virtuous deeds of one without compassion will be flawed."},{"kural number": 250, "english mk translation": "When thinking of harming the weaker, one should not forget that there are stronger beings before them."},{"kural number": 251, "english mk translation": "How can one who kills another being to nourish their own body be compassionate?"},{"kural number": 252, "english mk translation": "Those who do not protect their wealth are not truly wealthy; those who eat meat are not truly compassionate."},{"kural number": 253, "english mk translation": "The hearts of those who wield weapons and those who savor the flesh of another being are not capable of compassion."},{"kural number": 254, "english mk translation": "Non-violence is compassion; violence is uncompassionate. Therefore, eating meat is not virtuous."},{"kural number": 255, "english mk translation": "If people did not kill for meat, many beings would live. The mouth that craves meat would not open."},{"kural number": 256, "english mk translation": "If people did not kill for meat, no one would engage in the business of selling meat."},{"kural number": 257, "english mk translation": "Those who understand that meat is the wound of another being should refrain from eating it."},{"kural number": 258, "english mk translation": "The wise will not eat the flesh of another being."},{"kural number": 259, "english mk translation": "It is better not to kill a being for food than to perform a thousand sacrifices by offering ghee into fire."},{"kural number": 260, "english mk translation": "All beings will honor and bless those who do not eat meat and do not kill for it."},{"kural number": 261, "english mk translation": "Enduring all hardships and causing no harm to any being is called penance."},{"kural number": 262, "english mk translation": "The glory of penance belongs only to those with determination and self-control; for those without disciplined conduct, undertaking penance is futile."},{"kural number": 263, "english mk translation": "One should not forget their own penance out of a desire to support ascetics."},{"kural number": 264, "english mk translation": "Only when penance is strengthened by determination and self-control can one defeat enemies and protect friends merely by thought."},{"kural number": 265, "english mk translation": "Penance, which allows one to achieve desired outcomes, is undertaken with swift effort."},{"kural number": 266, "english mk translation": "Only those who practice penance with self-control, love, and endurance are performing their duty; others are driven by desire and engage in futile actions."},{"kural number": 267, "english mk translation": "Those who undertake penance with determination, enduring hardships, will shine with fame like gold refined by fire."},{"kural number": 268, "english mk translation": "The world will praise those who do not possess the ego of 'self' and 'mine'."},{"kural number": 269, "english mk translation": "Those with the strength to endure any suffering and remain steadfast in their goal will conquer even death."},{"kural number": 270, "english mk translation": "The reason for the multitude of the powerless is the fewness of the determined and the abundance of the indecisive."},{"kural number": 271, "english mk translation": "The five elements - earth, water, fire, air, space - within the body of a deceiver who pretends to be virtuous will laugh at their deception."},{"kural number": 272, "english mk translation": "One who commits a wrong act, knowing it to be wrong in their heart, gains no benefit from wearing the guise of an ascetic."},{"kural number": 273, "english mk translation": "For one who cannot control their mind, adopting the guise of an ascetic is like a cow wearing a tiger's skin and grazing on crops."},{"kural number": 274, "english mk translation": "There is no difference between a hunter hiding in the bushes and setting traps for birds, and an ascetic engaging in improper acts."},{"kural number": 275, "english mk translation": "Those who deceive the world by pretending to have renounced attachments, while regretting their actions, will face suffering."},{"kural number": 276, "english mk translation": "There is no one more merciless than those who pretend to have renounced attachments without truly doing so."},{"kural number": 277, "english mk translation": "There are those in the world who appear red like the 'kundrimani' seed, but whose hearts are as dark as the tip of the seed."},{"kural number": 278, "english mk translation": "Just as divers hide underwater, many impure individuals hide behind the guise of nobility."},{"kural number": 279, "english mk translation": "Just as a straight arrow, a curved harp, and music have their own nature, a person's character should be understood through their actions."},{"kural number": 280, "english mk translation": "An ascetic who does not renounce actions that are condemned by the world, but merely changes their appearance by shaving their head or growing matted hair, is merely a trickster."},{"kural number": 281, "english mk translation": "One who guards their mind against the thought of stealing anything can live without being disgraced."},{"kural number": 282, "english mk translation": "Even the thought of cunningly taking another's property is a fault."},{"kural number": 283, "english mk translation": "Accumulating wealth through theft may seem significant at first, but it will also destroy existing wealth."},{"kural number": 284, "english mk translation": "An insatiable thirst for theft will cause unending suffering due to its consequences."},{"kural number": 285, "english mk translation": "Those who think of stealing another's property when they are unaware lack the virtue of compassion."},{"kural number": 286, "english mk translation": "Those who do not live a disciplined life within limits will be inclined to steal others' property."},{"kural number": 287, "english mk translation": "Those who live with measure and discipline do not resort to the cunning of theft."},{"kural number": 288, "english mk translation": "The righteous person's heart follows the path of virtue; the thief's heart follows the crooked path of deceit."},{"kural number": 289, "english mk translation": "Those who do not seek any path other than measure will perish due to excessive actions."},{"kural number": 290, "english mk translation": "Thieves may lose their life; those who do not even think of theft will never lose their glorious life."},{"kural number": 291, "english mk translation": "Speaking a word that does not cause even the slightest harm to others is called truthfulness."},{"kural number": 292, "english mk translation": "If a lie can lead to a faultless good, it can be considered truthful."},{"kural number": 293, "english mk translation": "One should not lie against their conscience; if they do, their own conscience will punish them."},{"kural number": 294, "english mk translation": "Those who live without even thinking of lies in their hearts will find a permanent place in people's hearts."},{"kural number": 295, "english mk translation": "Those who speak truth from the heart, not just from the lips, are superior to those who practice penance and charity."},{"kural number": 296, "english mk translation": "There is no life as glorious as living without lies; that life brings eternal virtuous benefits."},{"kural number": 297, "english mk translation": "The benefit of not doing wrong is less than the benefit of adhering to the truth without fail."},{"kural number": 298, "english mk translation": "Bathing removes bodily dirt; to purify the mind, one needs truthfulness in word and deed."},{"kural number": 299, "english mk translation": "The lamp of truthfulness, which dispels inner darkness, is more illuminating than lamps that dispel outer darkness."},{"kural number": 300, "english mk translation": "The greatest virtue is truthfulness; this is the confirmed truth after investigation."},{"kural number": 301, "english mk translation": "One who does not get angry when anger would be effective is one who controls anger; what is the use of controlling anger when it is ineffective?"},{"kural number": 302, "english mk translation": "Getting angry with the strong will cause harm; getting angry with the weak will cause even greater harm."},{"kural number": 303, "english mk translation": "One should forget anger towards anyone; otherwise, anger itself will cause evil consequences."},{"kural number": 304, "english mk translation": "Those who are angry lose not only their cheerful appearance but also their inner joy."},{"kural number": 305, "english mk translation": "If one wishes to protect oneself, one must abandon anger; otherwise, anger will destroy them."},{"kural number": 306, "english mk translation": "Anger is a fire that destroys the angry person and even their supporting relatives."},{"kural number": 307, "english mk translation": "Just as hitting the ground with one's hand causes pain to the hand, one who harbors anger suffers from it."},{"kural number": 308, "english mk translation": "Even if someone causes continuous suffering like being burned by fire, it is best to forgive them when they seek reconciliation."},{"kural number": 309, "english mk translation": "If one does not harbor anger in their heart, they can achieve all their desires."},{"kural number": 310, "english mk translation": "Those who are endlessly angry are like the dead; those who completely renounce anger are like ascetics."},{"kural number": 311, "english mk translation": "Even if immense wealth can be gained, the noble will not engage in actions that harm others for it."},{"kural number": 312, "english mk translation": "The greatest virtue of a noble person is to endure harm inflicted by others without retaliating."},{"kural number": 313, "english mk translation": "If someone who does no harm to others is harmed, the resulting harm will be irreparable."},{"kural number": 314, "english mk translation": "The best way to punish those who harm us is to do good to them, making them ashamed."},{"kural number": 315, "english mk translation": "Those who do not consider the suffering of other beings as their own, even if they have knowledge, gain no benefit from it."},{"kural number": 316, "english mk translation": "One should not inflict on others the hardships they have experienced and learned from in their own life."},{"kural number": 317, "english mk translation": "The highest excellence is to never even think of demeaning anyone, at any time, in any way."},{"kural number": 318, "english mk translation": "Should not one who understands the suffering caused by harming others refrain from inflicting it on them?"},{"kural number": 319, "english mk translation": "While one rejoices in harming others, the same harm will befall them."},{"kural number": 320, "english mk translation": "Harm will come to those who inflict harm; therefore, those who desire a life free from harm should not harm others."},{"kural number": 321, "english mk translation": "Non-killing is virtue; killing breeds all evils."},{"kural number": 322, "english mk translation": "There is nothing equal to the principle of sharing what one has, whether rich or poor, so that all beings can live."},{"kural number": 323, "english mk translation": "Among virtues, non-killing comes first, followed by truthfulness."},{"kural number": 324, "english mk translation": "Adhering to the principle of not killing any being is called the path of virtue."},{"kural number": 325, "english mk translation": "Among those who have renounced the world, the one who hates killing and practices non-killing is the greatest."},{"kural number": 326, "english mk translation": "Even death will hesitate to take the life of one whose life's virtue is non-killing."},{"kural number": 327, "english mk translation": "Even if one's own life is at stake, one should not take another's life."},{"kural number": 328, "english mk translation": "Even if killing could bring great benefit, noble people will consider that benefit ignoble."},{"kural number": 329, "english mk translation": "The wise will consider murderers, who act without reason, as lower than ignoble beings."},{"kural number": 330, "english mk translation": "It is said that those who suffer from poverty and disease have committed many killings in their past lives."},{"kural number": 331, "english mk translation": "Believing impermanent things to be permanent is the most ignoble ignorance."},{"kural number": 332, "english mk translation": "The departure of accumulated wealth is like people dispersing after a performance."},{"kural number": 333, "english mk translation": "Realizing that wealth is impermanent, one should immediately engage in lasting good deeds."},{"kural number": 334, "english mk translation": "Those who understand life know that each day is a sword that cuts short one's lifespan."},{"kural number": 335, "english mk translation": "Realizing the impermanence of life, one should strive to perform noble deeds while one is alive."},{"kural number": 336, "english mk translation": "This world prides itself on having ended the life of someone who was alive yesterday."},{"kural number": 337, "english mk translation": "Only those who have never contemplated the truth of life build castles in the air without limit."},{"kural number": 338, "english mk translation": "The relationship between life and body is like that between an egg and a chick."},{"kural number": 339, "english mk translation": "In this impermanent life, birth is like waking up after sleep; death is falling into an eternal sleep from which one never wakes."},{"kural number": 340, "english mk translation": "The soul residing in the body has no other refuge once separated from it."},{"kural number": 341, "english mk translation": "If one renounces any one attachment, the suffering arising from that specific attachment will not affect them."},{"kural number": 342, "english mk translation": "If one renounces everything while still possessing it, when suffering strikes, they will experience many joys in the world."},{"kural number": 343, "english mk translation": "Controlling the five senses and renouncing all that they desire is the characteristic of renunciation."},{"kural number": 344, "english mk translation": "Complete renunciation is the ideal; even attachment to one thing will multiply attachments and cause delusion."},{"kural number": 345, "english mk translation": "For ascetics seeking to end the suffering of birth, their own body is already a burden; why seek further attachments?"},{"kural number": 346, "english mk translation": "One who completely renounces the ego of 'I' and 'mine' will attain world fame that surpasses even celestial fame."},{"kural number": 347, "english mk translation": "Those who cling to attachments are clung to by suffering."},{"kural number": 348, "english mk translation": "Only those who renounce completely will attain the highest state; those who do not renounce partially are trapped in the net of ignorance."},{"kural number": 349, "english mk translation": "If attachments are renounced, the joys and sorrows of birth do not arise; otherwise, the cycle of joys and sorrows continues."},{"kural number": 350, "english mk translation": "One should only be attached to those who are free from all attachments. This attachment helps ascetics renounce their own attachments."},{"kural number": 351, "english mk translation": "The life of one who mistakenly believes an illusory object to be real will not be prosperous."},{"kural number": 352, "english mk translation": "If delusion is cleared and the pure truth is realized, ignorance will vanish and well-being will arise."},{"kural number": 353, "english mk translation": "Those who resolve doubts through diligent inquiry will be motivated to believe that heaven is closer than the earth."},{"kural number": 354, "english mk translation": "Even if one has controlled the five senses, without realizing the truth, there is no benefit."},{"kural number": 355, "english mk translation": "Understanding the truth behind appearances, rather than being deceived by them, is wisdom."},{"kural number": 356, "english mk translation": "Those who learn all that is necessary for ascetic life, understand the true meaning, and live accordingly will not desire household life again."},{"kural number": 357, "english mk translation": "Those who investigate and realize the truth will not believe in rebirth."},{"kural number": 358, "english mk translation": "Dispelling the ignorance called rebirth and establishing the realized truth is wisdom."},{"kural number": 359, "english mk translation": "To avoid suffering, one must understand its causes and renounce attachment to them."},{"kural number": 360, "english mk translation": "Suffering will perish for those who do not give room for desire, aversion, and ignorance."},{"kural number": 361, "english mk translation": "Desire can be called the seed that sprouts in all beings at all times."},{"kural number": 362, "english mk translation": "The suffering that makes one wish they had never been born arises from unfulfilled desires; these will come if desires are not eradicated."},{"kural number": 363, "english mk translation": "There is no wealth greater than renouncing harmful desires; indeed, such unparalleled wealth does not exist elsewhere."},{"kural number": 364, "english mk translation": "Purity is the absence of greed; this purity is attained only by those who seek truth."},{"kural number": 365, "english mk translation": "One who has renounced all desires is called an ascetic; one who has not completely renounced is not a pure ascetic."},{"kural number": 366, "english mk translation": "Desire is the cause of deceiving and ruining others; therefore, one must live in fear of becoming a slave to desire."},{"kural number": 367, "english mk translation": "To live a life that does not perish, one must completely eradicate greed."},{"kural number": 368, "english mk translation": "Those without desire have no suffering; if desire arises, suffering will follow relentlessly."},{"kural number": 369, "english mk translation": "If greed, which causes great suffering, is eradicated, life will be filled with unending joy."},{"kural number": 370, "english mk translation": "Living without innate, uncontrollable greed naturally brings unending joy."},{"kural number": 371, "english mk translation": "The natural tendency towards progress brings unwavering motivation; the natural tendency towards decline brings laziness."},{"kural number": 372, "english mk translation": "The natural tendency towards destruction causes ignorance; the natural tendency towards progress expands knowledge."},{"kural number": 373, "english mk translation": "Even if one has studied books that impart sharp intellect, their innate intelligence will prevail."},{"kural number": 374, "english mk translation": "The world has two natural states: one of wealth and one of knowledge."},{"kural number": 375, "english mk translation": "The natural tendency is for good deeds to end in evil, and evil deeds to end in good."},{"kural number": 376, "english mk translation": "Even if one protects what is not rightfully theirs, it may not last; what is rightfully theirs will remain wherever it is placed."},{"kural number": 377, "english mk translation": "If one does not live according to a structured life plan, even accumulating vast wealth will yield little benefit."},{"kural number": 378, "english mk translation": "Ascetics renounce worldly desires when they realize there is nothing permanent to cling to."},{"kural number": 379, "english mk translation": "Good and bad alternate in life. What is stronger than nature?"},{"kural number": 381, "english mk translation": "A kingdom possessing six strengths - a powerful army, knowledgeable citizens, abundant resources, efficient ministers, unbreakable alliances, and impregnable forts - is like a lion among kingdoms."},{"kural number": 382, "english mk translation": "Courage, compassion, wisdom, and the determination to achieve high goals are the qualities required for a ruler."},{"kural number": 383, "english mk translation": "Swift action, wisdom, and courage are essential and enduring qualities for rulers."},{"kural number": 384, "english mk translation": "Those who rule with virtue, without committing any offense, with valor and honor, are the best rulers."},{"kural number": 385, "english mk translation": "Properly managing revenue sources, increasing treasury income, protecting it, and spending it strategically is the hallmark of good governance."},{"kural number": 386, "english mk translation": "The world praises a kingdom that is easily accessible and whose ruler speaks kindly."},{"kural number": 387, "english mk translation": "Those who speak sweetly and protect others will have the world at their command."},{"kural number": 388, "english mk translation": "A ruler who governs justly and protects the people will be revered as their leader."},{"kural number": 389, "english mk translation": "A kingdom whose ruler tolerates even harsh, ear-piercing words will be respected by the people."},{"kural number": 390, "english mk translation": "Providing for the welfare of the people, showing compassion with understanding, ruling impartially, and protecting the people adds glory to a kingdom."},{"kural number": 391, "english mk translation": "One should learn faultless things to the extent that their own flaws are removed, and then act accordingly."},{"kural number": 392, "english mk translation": "Those who possess the eyes of knowledge - learning and writing - are considered truly alive."},{"kural number": 393, "english mk translation": "Even if one is blind, if they are learned, they are considered sighted; if one is unlearned, even with eyes, they are considered wounded."},{"kural number": 394, "english mk translation": "Associating joyfully with others and grieving upon separation are the actions of the wise."},{"kural number": 395, "english mk translation": "Those who do not learn from the wise, pretending ignorance before them, will be considered lowly."},{"kural number": 396, "english mk translation": "Just as a spring yields more water when dug deeper, knowledge increases with continuous learning."},{"kural number": 397, "english mk translation": "Since learned people are honored everywhere, why waste one's life without learning until death?"},{"kural number": 398, "english mk translation": "The knowledge gained in one generation serves as protection for seven generations."},{"kural number": 399, "english mk translation": "Seeing that the knowledge that brings them joy also brings joy to others, scholars will desire to learn more."},{"kural number": 400, "english mk translation": "Knowledge is the only imperishable wealth; there is no other wealth equal to it."},{"kural number": 401, "english mk translation": "Speaking in an assembly without profound knowledge is like playing chess without setting up the board."},{"kural number": 402, "english mk translation": "Desiring to hear the words of an unlearned person is like desiring a woman without breasts."},{"kural number": 403, "english mk translation": "If those who have not learned remain silent in the presence of the learned, they too will be considered good."},{"kural number": 404, "english mk translation": "Even if an unlearned person has natural intelligence, the wise will not consider them learned."},{"kural number": 405, "english mk translation": "The pretense of the unlearned to be great scholars will crumble when they converse with true scholars."},{"kural number": 406, "english mk translation": "It is appropriate to compare the unlearned to barren land, as they are considered mere walking corpses."},{"kural number": 407, "english mk translation": "Those who have attractive appearances but lack deep knowledge are valued like clay dolls."},{"kural number": 408, "english mk translation": "The wealth possessed by fools causes more suffering than the poverty endured by the good."},{"kural number": 409, "english mk translation": "The pride of being learned removes the distinction between high and low."},{"kural number": 410, "english mk translation": "The difference between humans and animals is the same as the difference between those who have studied knowledge scriptures and those who have not."},{"kural number": 411, "english mk translation": "The wealth of knowledge gained through listening is the foremost of all wealths."},{"kural number": 412, "english mk translation": "When there is no 'food for the ears', then food for the stomach becomes necessary."},{"kural number": 413, "english mk translation": "Those who listen to knowledge are considered equal to the wise who eat sparingly and possess profound knowledge."},{"kural number": 414, "english mk translation": "Even without studying scriptures, listening to the learned provides support like a walking stick for the unsteady."},{"kural number": 415, "english mk translation": "Just as a walking stick helps navigate slippery ground, the advice of the virtuous helps."},{"kural number": 416, "english mk translation": "One should believe that listening to good things brings greater glory."},{"kural number": 417, "english mk translation": "Those who analyze deeply and have listening knowledge, even if they misunderstand some things, will not speak foolishly."},{"kural number": 418, "english mk translation": "Even if ears are capable of hearing, if they refuse to listen to the virtuous, they are considered deaf."},{"kural number": 419, "english mk translation": "Those without clear listening knowledge cannot possess the virtue of speaking humbly."},{"kural number": 420, "english mk translation": "Those who live only for the taste of their tongue, without appreciating the taste of listening, are no different from the dead."},{"kural number": 421, "english mk translation": "Knowledge is the only fortress that protects against destruction by enemies."},{"kural number": 422, "english mk translation": "Wisdom is choosing the right path, rejecting evil paths, and not letting the mind wander."},{"kural number": 423, "english mk translation": "Wisdom is investigating and discerning the truth, rather than blindly accepting what anyone says."},{"kural number": 424, "english mk translation": "Wisdom is speaking clearly so that listeners understand, and analyzing the subtle points made by others."},{"kural number": 425, "english mk translation": "Wisdom is befriending the noble, who are considered the true people of the world, and treating both joy and sorrow equally."},{"kural number": 426, "english mk translation": "Wisdom is acting in accordance with the way the world operates, guided by the noble."},{"kural number": 427, "english mk translation": "Only the wise contemplate the consequences of actions; the foolish do not."},{"kural number": 428, "english mk translation": "Only the foolish do not fear what should be feared; only the wise fear what should be feared."},{"kural number": 429, "english mk translation": "Those who foresee and protect themselves from danger will not face shocking calamities."},{"kural number": 430, "english mk translation": "Those without knowledge have no greatness, even if they possess everything; those with knowledge have no smallness, even if they possess nothing."},{"kural number": 431, "english mk translation": "Influence is respected only in those who lack arrogance, anger, and ignoble conduct."},{"kural number": 432, "english mk translation": "Greed, wounded pride, and delight in corrupt actions are great harms to leadership qualities."},{"kural number": 433, "english mk translation": "Those who fear blame will consider even a tiny fault as large as a palm tree and refrain from it."},{"kural number": 434, "english mk translation": "Committing faults becomes an enemy that brings destruction; therefore, one should aim to avoid faults."},{"kural number": 435, "english mk translation": "The life of one who does not take precautions and avoids mistakes will be consumed like a haystack before fire."},{"kural number": 436, "english mk translation": "What harm will befall a leader who first removes their own flaws and then points out the flaws of others?"},{"kural number": 437, "english mk translation": "The wealth hoarded by the miser, without performing good deeds, will be wasted without benefit."},{"kural number": 438, "english mk translation": "The greatest fault is accumulating wealth without sharing it with anyone."},{"kural number": 439, "english mk translation": "One should not engage in unproductive actions due to arrogance, thinking oneself superior at any time."},{"kural number": 440, "english mk translation": "If one fulfills their desires without letting enemies know their intentions, the enemies' plans will fail."},{"kural number": 441, "english mk translation": "One should choose friendships wisely, seeking the company of wise elders."},{"kural number": 442, "english mk translation": "One should seek the support of great individuals who can alleviate current suffering and prevent future calamities."},{"kural number": 443, "english mk translation": "Associating with and honoring great people is a greater boon than any other."},{"kural number": 444, "english mk translation": "Aligning oneself with and following the guidance of elders who are superior in knowledge and ability provides immense strength."},{"kural number": 445, "english mk translation": "Rulers benefit most when surrounded by wise individuals who can perceive and advise."},{"kural number": 446, "english mk translation": "If a capable person surrounds themselves with equally capable individuals, enemies cannot inflict any harm."},{"kural number": 447, "english mk translation": "Who can harm those who act with the support of those who offer constructive criticism?"},{"kural number": 448, "english mk translation": "A kingdom without those who point out flaws will perish on its own."},{"kural number": 449, "english mk translation": "The state of those without supportive companions is like a merchant's business without investment - no returns."},{"kural number": 450, "english mk translation": "Abandoning the company of the virtuous is more harmful than making enemies."},{"kural number": 451, "english mk translation": "The noble do not associate with the base; but the base, like attracts like, will join the base."},{"kural number": 452, "english mk translation": "Just as water takes on the quality of the land it flows through, a person's intellect takes on the quality of the company they keep."},{"kural number": 453, "english mk translation": "A person's character depends on their emotions, but their perceived nature depends on the company they keep."},{"kural number": 454, "english mk translation": "A person's intellect, though seemingly inherent, is revealed by the company they keep."},{"kural number": 455, "english mk translation": "Only if one's associations are pure will their mind and actions be pure."},{"kural number": 456, "english mk translation": "Purity of mind brings fame; purity of association brings good deeds."},{"kural number": 457, "english mk translation": "Purity of mind enriches life; purity of association brings all glory."},{"kural number": 458, "english mk translation": "Even a wise person's strength depends on the company they keep."},{"kural number": 459, "english mk translation": "Even the noble, with a strong heart, derives strength from the determination of their associates."},{"kural number": 460, "english mk translation": "Nothing is as supportive as good company, and nothing is as harmful as bad company."},{"kural number": 461, "english mk translation": "One should engage in an action only after considering the potential benefits and harms."},{"kural number": 462, "english mk translation": "If one acts after careful consideration with trusted friends, nothing is impossible."},{"kural number": 463, "english mk translation": "Wise people will not undertake actions that risk losing their initial capital for the sake of potential gain."},{"kural number": 464, "english mk translation": "Those who fear blame will consider the consequences and refrain from blameworthy actions."},{"kural number": 465, "english mk translation": "Undertaking to defeat enemies without thorough preparation will only strengthen the enemy."},{"kural number": 466, "english mk translation": "Harm results from doing what should not be done, and also from not doing what should be done."},{"kural number": 467, "english mk translation": "One should think before acting; it is wrong to think after acting."},{"kural number": 468, "english mk translation": "Even with many supporters, an improperly executed endeavor will ultimately fail."},{"kural number": 469, "english mk translation": "One should understand another's nature before helping them; otherwise, the help may turn into harm."},{"kural number": 470, "english mk translation": "Noble people do not approve of actions contrary to their status; therefore, one should only do actions that they would not condemn."},{"kural number": 471, "english mk translation": "One should engage in an action only after analyzing the strength of the action, their own strength, the enemy's strength, and the strength of their allies."},{"kural number": 472, "english mk translation": "If one undertakes an action after thoroughly analyzing it, nothing is impossible."},{"kural number": 473, "english mk translation": "Many have started actions without understanding their own strength, only to fail midway."},{"kural number": 474, "english mk translation": "Those who overestimate themselves and go beyond their limits will face ruin, like someone climbing a tree and trying to go higher."},{"kural number": 475, "english mk translation": "Even a peacock feather, if overloaded, can break the axle of a cart."},{"kural number": 476, "english mk translation": "One who overestimates themselves and exceeds their limits is like someone who has climbed to the tip of a branch and tries to go higher - they will fall."},{"kural number": 477, "english mk translation": "Living by managing resources according to income is the way to preserve wealth."},{"kural number": 478, "english mk translation": "If expenses do not exceed income, even with low income, no harm will occur."},{"kural number": 479, "english mk translation": "If one does not plan actions based on what they have, what they can do, and what they can earn, even apparent strength or wealth will disappear."},{"kural number": 480, "english mk translation": "If one gives excessively without assessing their resources, their wealth will soon diminish."},{"kural number": 481, "english mk translation": "During the day, a crow can mistake a kite for a hawk. Therefore, one must choose the right time to defeat an enemy."},{"kural number": 482, "english mk translation": "Acting according to the opportune time will be like a rope that secures the success of the action."},{"kural number": 483, "english mk translation": "With the necessary resources and understanding the opportune time, nothing is impossible."},{"kural number": 484, "english mk translation": "If one understands the opportune time and place, the whole world can be conquered."},{"kural number": 485, "english mk translation": "Those who wait patiently for the opportune time without getting agitated will conquer the world."},{"kural number": 486, "english mk translation": "Even when facing adversity, the steadfast do not remain idle out of fear; it is like a ram pulling back its legs to charge its enemy."},{"kural number": 487, "english mk translation": "Even if one harbors anger towards the enemy, it is wise to wait patiently for the right time and place to express it."},{"kural number": 488, "english mk translation": "Until the opportune moment arrives for the enemy to fall, one must patiently endure their hostility."},{"kural number": 489, "english mk translation": "When a rare opportunity arises, one must seize it and accomplish difficult tasks immediately."},{"kural number": 490, "english mk translation": "One must wait patiently like a crane until the opportune time, and then strike decisively like it does."},{"kural number": 491, "english mk translation": "Without belittling any task as insignificant, one must choose the right place and engage in the action."},{"kural number": 492, "english mk translation": "Even if one has the strength to attack, combining it with the advantage of a fort will yield great results."},{"kural number": 493, "english mk translation": "If one attacks from a suitable location, protecting themselves, even the weak can gain strength and achieve victory."},{"kural number": 494, "english mk translation": "If one attacks persistently from the right location, enemies will not even dream of victory."},{"kural number": 495, "english mk translation": "A crocodile is powerful in water, but even a weak creature can defeat it on land. Similarly, one must choose the right environment."},{"kural number": 496, "english mk translation": "One who chooses the right place for an action must understand that a chariot cannot run in the sea, nor a ship on land."},{"kural number": 497, "english mk translation": "If one plans an action flawlessly, courage alone is sufficient support; no other support is needed."},{"kural number": 498, "english mk translation": "Even a small army, fighting from its advantageous position, can defeat a larger army."},{"kural number": 499, "english mk translation": "Even without forts and other military advantages, attacking an enemy's established territory is not easy."},{"kural number": 500, "english mk translation": "An elephant that can defeat spear-wielding warriors will be killed by jackals if it gets stuck in mud."},{"kural number": 501, "english mk translation": "One should select someone who is virtuous, financially honest, not swayed by pleasure, and fearless for a task."},{"kural number": 502, "english mk translation": "One who is blameless and fears committing offenses should be considered of noble birth."},{"kural number": 503, "english mk translation": "Even those praised for extensive learning and flawlessness cannot be definitively said to be free from ignorance upon deep examination."},{"kural number": 504, "english mk translation": "One should analyze a person's virtues and flaws, determine which are predominant, and then form a clear judgment about them."},{"kural number": 505, "english mk translation": "A person's actions serve as the touchstone to determine whether they are of quality or inferior."},{"kural number": 506, "english mk translation": "One should not appoint undisciplined individuals to a task, as they will act without regard for the world or blame."},{"kural number": 507, "english mk translation": "Appointing an ignorant person out of affection is foolishness and yields no benefit."},{"kural number": 508, "english mk translation": "Selecting and appointing someone without proper investigation will bring unending suffering to future generations."},{"kural number": 509, "english mk translation": "One should trust someone only after thorough investigation; never trust without investigation."},{"kural number": 510, "english mk translation": "Selecting someone without investigation and then doubting them brings incurable suffering."},{"kural number": 511, "english mk translation": "Those who understand good and evil and are dedicated only to good deeds are qualified for any task."},{"kural number": 512, "english mk translation": "One who can expand sources of income, increase resources, and analyze and remove obstacles is capable of action."},{"kural number": 513, "english mk translation": "It is beneficial to select someone who consistently possesses love, knowledge, capability, and absence of greed."},{"kural number": 514, "english mk translation": "Many people, despite thorough planning, act differently when it comes to execution."},{"kural number": 515, "english mk translation": "One should not entrust a task to anyone other than someone capable of executing it after careful consideration."},{"kural number": 516, "english mk translation": "Select a capable person, analyze the task, understand the timing, and then execute it."},{"kural number": 517, "english mk translation": "One should observe how a person completes a task and then entrust that task to them."},{"kural number": 518, "english mk translation": "One should investigate whether a person is suitable for a task before assigning it to them."},{"kural number": 519, "english mk translation": "The glory will depart from those who associate with someone dedicated to completing tasks, if they wrongly suspect that person."},{"kural number": 520, "english mk translation": "As long as the hearts of the hardworking are not saddened, the prosperity of the world will not fade. Therefore, rulers must daily assess and act for the welfare of the hardworking."},{"kural number": 521, "english mk translation": "Those who uphold old relationships even in times of poverty are true relatives."},{"kural number": 522, "english mk translation": "If one is blessed with relatives whose love does not diminish in any situation, it will bring them prosperity and growth."},{"kural number": 523, "english mk translation": "The life of one who does not interact with loved ones with love and joy is as useless as a pond without banks filled with water."},{"kural number": 524, "english mk translation": "The true benefit of one's wealth is living surrounded by relatives who love them."},{"kural number": 525, "english mk translation": "Those who are generous and speak kindly will always be surrounded by relatives."},{"kural number": 526, "english mk translation": "If one is generous and controls their anger, no one else will have as many relatives."},{"kural number": 527, "english mk translation": "Those who share what they have with relatives, like crows sharing food, are the only ones who will rise in the world."},{"kural number": 528, "english mk translation": "Although all people are equal, if a ruler utilizes them according to their abilities, the people will rally around the kingdom like a fortress."},{"kural number": 529, "english mk translation": "Relatives who leave for some reason will return seeking reconciliation when they realize their reason was invalid."},{"kural number": 530, "english mk translation": "Those who leave for a reason and then return with a valid cause should be carefully considered and accepted."},{"kural number": 531, "english mk translation": "Forgetfulness arising from excessive joy is more harmful than the consequences of uncontrolled anger."},{"kural number": 532, "english mk translation": "Just as poverty destroys knowledge, forgetfulness destroys fame."},{"kural number": 533, "english mk translation": "The conclusion of scholars is that those who are forgetful have no lasting fame."},{"kural number": 534, "english mk translation": "Those who tremble with fear have no benefit even with a fortress around them; similarly, those who are forgetful have no benefit from their high position."},{"kural number": 535, "english mk translation": "One who fails to take precautions before adversity strikes will regret their mistakes after suffering."},{"kural number": 536, "english mk translation": "If one possesses the virtue of remembrance, nothing else can bring them as much benefit."},{"kural number": 537, "english mk translation": "With remembrance and careful action, nothing is impossible."},{"kural number": 538, "english mk translation": "One should fulfill their glorious duties; those who neglect them will not rise in life."},{"kural number": 539, "english mk translation": "Those who forget their duties due to arrogance should reflect on those who perished due to forgetfulness and learn from them."},{"kural number": 540, "english mk translation": "Those who are motivated and determined to achieve their goals will find it easy to attain them."},{"kural number": 541, "english mk translation": "Justice is the impartial investigation of faults and the delivery of judgment without bias."},{"kural number": 542, "english mk translation": "Just as the world needs rain to live, a kingdom needs good governance."},{"kural number": 543, "english mk translation": "The just rule of a kingdom is the foundation for virtuous scriptures and virtuous actions."},{"kural number": 544, "english mk translation": "The world honors the footsteps of a just ruler who embraces the people."},{"kural number": 545, "english mk translation": "If a kingdom is ruled justly, that justice will protect it, just as timely rain brings abundant harvest."},{"kural number": 546, "english mk translation": "Victory for a kingdom comes not from the weapon that defeats enemies, but from the unwavering scepter that protects the people."},{"kural number": 547, "english mk translation": "If a kingdom is ruled justly, that justice will protect it."},{"kural number": 548, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that rules with pomp and without investigating justice will decline and perish."},{"kural number": 549, "english mk translation": "It is the duty of a kingdom to protect its people and punish wrongdoers without fear of personal repercussions."},{"kural number": 550, "english mk translation": "Punishing those who commit crimes like murder is like weeding for crop prosperity."},{"kural number": 551, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that oppresses its people unjustly is more cruel than a murderer."},{"kural number": 552, "english mk translation": "For rulers to extort wealth from their subjects is like a robber with a spear threatening them."},{"kural number": 553, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that does not daily examine the consequences of its rule and act accordingly will fall into ruin."},{"kural number": 554, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that rules unjustly without examining the state of the land will lose its resources and the people's respect."},{"kural number": 555, "english mk translation": "The tears shed by the people due to oppression are the weapons that destroy a kingdom."},{"kural number": 556, "english mk translation": "Just rule brings glory to a kingdom; otherwise, its glory will fade and perish."},{"kural number": 557, "english mk translation": "Just as the world suffers without rain, people suffer under a ruler without compassion."},{"kural number": 558, "english mk translation": "Even a life free from poverty is more miserable under a tyrannical rule than poverty itself."},{"kural number": 559, "english mk translation": "In a kingdom ruled unjustly, even water resources become useless, and one cannot even store rainwater for prosperity."},{"kural number": 560, "english mk translation": "If a kingdom fails to protect itself properly, development will cease, and essential industries will decline."},{"kural number": 561, "english mk translation": "It is the duty of a kingdom to investigate crimes impartially, and to punish them appropriately to prevent recurrence."},{"kural number": 562, "english mk translation": "The influence of those who are strict in preventing crimes but lenient in punishment will last long."},{"kural number": 563, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that rules tyrannically, causing fear among its subjects, will surely perish soon."},{"kural number": 564, "english mk translation": "A kingdom perceived by its subjects as speaking harsh words will quickly lose its glory."},{"kural number": 565, "english mk translation": "Immense wealth possessed by someone unapproachable and with a stern face is like a terrifying demonic appearance."},{"kural number": 566, "english mk translation": "The great wealth of those with harsh words and uncompassionate hearts will not last and will perish."},{"kural number": 567, "english mk translation": "Harsh words and unjust punishment act like grinding tools that wear down and weaken a kingdom's strength."},{"kural number": 568, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that acts impulsively out of anger, without consulting its allies, will collapse on its own."},{"kural number": 569, "english mk translation": "A ruler without adequate preparation will face fear and ruin when war arrives."},{"kural number": 570, "english mk translation": "A tyrannical kingdom relies on the unlearned for support; there is no greater burden on the earth."},{"kural number": 571, "english mk translation": "This world is glorious because of those who possess the great beauty of compassion and kindness."},{"kural number": 572, "english mk translation": "Those who act contrary to the world's principle of embracing with love and compassion are a burden to this earth."},{"kural number": 573, "english mk translation": "Compassion that does not align with love is as useless as music that does not align with melody."},{"kural number": 574, "english mk translation": "Eyes that do not express love and compassion from the heart are merely external features, serving no other purpose."},{"kural number": 575, "english mk translation": "The eyes of the compassionate are true eyes; the eyes of the uncompassionate are blind."},{"kural number": 576, "english mk translation": "Even if one has eyes but lacks the love and compassion associated with them, they are equivalent to a tree."},{"kural number": 577, "english mk translation": "Those with compassionate hearts are truly sighted; the uncompassionate are considered blind."},{"kural number": 578, "english mk translation": "Those who are foremost in duty and compassion will own this world."},{"kural number": 579, "english mk translation": "Showing patience even towards those who intend to destroy you is the highest virtue."},{"kural number": 580, "english mk translation": "Those with compassionate hearts and virtuous conduct will gladly accept even poison from those they associate with."},{"kural number": 581, "english mk translation": "A spy who is honest and capable, and a virtuous scripture that speaks justice, are considered the eyes of a kingdom."},{"kural number": 582, "english mk translation": "It is the duty of a kingdom to quickly ascertain all events concerning friends, enemies, and neutrals through spies at all times."},{"kural number": 583, "english mk translation": "A kingdom that does not ascertain the state of the land through spies and analyze the consequences will not prosper."},{"kural number": 584, "english mk translation": "Spies in a kingdom are considered honest only if they perform their duty without bias towards friends, enemies, or relatives."},{"kural number": 585, "english mk translation": "Only those who appear beyond suspicion, are fearless even when suspected, and reveal nothing of their thoughts, can serve as spies."},{"kural number": 586, "english mk translation": "The best spy is one who, while investigating an event, appears unrelated, thoroughly investigates, endures any suffering, and does not reveal their identity."},{"kural number": 587, "english mk translation": "The ability to ascertain hidden actions by hearing from those involved is the skill of intelligence gathering."},{"kural number": 588, "english mk translation": "Information obtained by one spy should be cross-checked with another spy to determine its truthfulness."},{"kural number": 589, "english mk translation": "If three spies, unknown to each other, report the same information, it can be considered true."},{"kural number": 590, "english mk translation": "If the skill of a spy is publicly recognized, the secret information they gather will be exposed."},{"kural number": 591, "english mk translation": "Only those with determination are considered possessors; those without determination are not possessors, regardless of what else they have."},{"kural number": 592, "english mk translation": "Other than determination, nothing else can be considered lasting possession."},{"kural number": 593, "english mk translation": "Those with unwavering determination will not be discouraged even if they lose their possessions."},{"kural number": 594, "english mk translation": "Greatness will seek out and find those with strong determination."},{"kural number": 595, "english mk translation": "Just as the length of a lotus stem corresponds to the water level, a person's greatness corresponds to their level of determination."},{"kural number": 596, "english mk translation": "One's thoughts should always be lofty; even if they are not achieved, one should not abandon those thoughts."},{"kural number": 597, "english mk translation": "Just as an elephant remains steadfast even when pierced by arrows, the determined will not be discouraged by destruction."},{"kural number": 598, "english mk translation": "One who lacks the desire to give generously cannot claim to be a benefactor."},{"kural number": 599, "english mk translation": "Determination is stronger than physical strength, as seen when a large elephant fears a tiger."},{"kural number": 600, "english mk translation": "Those without determination in their hearts are no different from trees, even if they appear human."},{"kural number": 601, "english mk translation": "Even if one is born into a glorious lineage, laziness will tarnish it."},{"kural number": 602, "english mk translation": "To elevate one's lineage, one must eradicate laziness and strive with determination."},{"kural number": 603, "english mk translation": "The lineage of a lazy person, lacking knowledge and diligence, will perish before them."},{"kural number": 604, "english mk translation": "Faults multiply in the lives of the lazy, and family honor declines."},{"kural number": 605, "english mk translation": "Procrastination, forgetfulness, laziness, and excessive sleep are the five boats that lead to ruin."},{"kural number": 606, "english mk translation": "Even if one is worthy of love, the lazy will find it difficult to achieve greatness."},{"kural number": 607, "english mk translation": "Those who live lazily, without diligence, will be scorned."},{"kural number": 608, "english mk translation": "Even if born into a noble family, laziness will enslave them to their enemies."},{"kural number": 609, "english mk translation": "If one eradicates laziness, their family honor and valor will naturally increase."},{"kural number": 610, "english mk translation": "The rewards of the diligent are like a king conquering all lands without effort."},{"kural number": 611, "english mk translation": "Without losing heart, if one strives with the belief that it is possible, it becomes a great strength."},{"kural number": 612, "english mk translation": "One must complete any task undertaken; otherwise, it will be like crossing half a well."},{"kural number": 613, "english mk translation": "The feeling of pride in helping others resides in those who possess the virtue of perseverance."},{"kural number": 614, "english mk translation": "There is no difference between a lazy person without diligence and a coward throwing a sword."},{"kural number": 615, "english mk translation": "One who strives to fulfill their task without selfishness, rather than seeking personal gain, becomes a pillar supporting their relatives, friends, and countrymen."},{"kural number": 616, "english mk translation": "Nothing exists without effort; effort is the cause of all great achievements."},{"kural number": 617, "english mk translation": "The terms 'Lakshmi' and 'Mudevi' refer to the diligent and the lazy respectively."},{"kural number": 618, "english mk translation": "It is wrong to blame fate for misfortune; the greatest fault is not acting after knowing what needs to be known."},{"kural number": 619, "english mk translation": "Calling out to God will not achieve results; effort brings success commensurate with the work."},{"kural number": 620, "english mk translation": "They say fate is invincible; but those who strive tirelessly will defeat even fate."},{"kural number": 621, "english mk translation": "The only thing that can overcome challenges is a mind that faces them with joy, not fear."},{"kural number": 622, "english mk translation": "When floods of suffering arise, the wise, by merely thinking of a solution, can make the suffering recede."},{"kural number": 623, "english mk translation": "Those who do not falter when surrounded by suffering will overcome suffering itself."},{"kural number": 624, "english mk translation": "Just as an ox pulls a heavy load on a rough path, persistent effort leads to the end of suffering and the attainment of success."},{"kural number": 625, "english mk translation": "Suffering that relentlessly pursues those who do not fear adversity will itself be destroyed."},{"kural number": 626, "english mk translation": "Will those who rejoice in their prosperity without protecting it not be devastated when they lose it?"},{"kural number": 627, "english mk translation": "The wise understand that suffering is natural to life and body, and do not consider it suffering when it arises."},{"kural number": 628, "english mk translation": "One who accepts suffering as natural, without seeking pleasure, will not be discouraged by it."},{"kural number": 629, "english mk translation": "Those who do not rejoice in pleasure will not grieve in suffering, treating both equally."},{"kural number": 630, "english mk translation": "Those who consider suffering as pleasure will earn the admiration of even their enemies."},{"kural number": 631, "english mk translation": "The best minister is one who understands the tools, opportune time, method, and task."},{"kural number": 632, "english mk translation": "A ministry should possess five qualities: courage, protection of subjects, knowledge of scriptures, understanding of action, and tireless effort."},{"kural number": 633, "english mk translation": "A minister's capability is shown in separating allies of the enemy, protecting the kingdom's allies, and reconciling those who have repented and returned."},{"kural number": 634, "english mk translation": "Choosing a task, planning its execution, and firmly stating the outcome are the hallmarks of a minister."},{"kural number": 635, "english mk translation": "Only those who are virtuous, eloquent, and capable can offer advice."},{"kural number": 636, "english mk translation": "What scheme can stand against someone with sharp intellect and practical wisdom? None."},{"kural number": 637, "english mk translation": "Even with theoretical knowledge of action, one must understand worldly practices and act accordingly."},{"kural number": 638, "english mk translation": "Those who lack hearing and their own sense must be courageously advised by their ministers."},{"kural number": 639, "english mk translation": "Having seventy million enemies is better than having one minister who thinks of wrong methods."},{"kural number": 640, "english mk translation": "Even well-formulated plans will remain incomplete if entrusted to incompetent individuals."},{"kural number": 641, "english mk translation": "There is no wealth equal to eloquence; it is the best of all wealths."},{"kural number": 642, "english mk translation": "Since listener and makes even the uninterested eager to hear."},{"kural number": 644, "english mk translation": "One must speak after understanding the reason; there is no virtue or truth equal to eloquent speech."},{"kural number": 645, "english mk translation": "One should use a word only after realizing that no other word can surpass it."},{"kural number": 646, "english mk translation": "It is the mark of the wise to speak in a way that listeners understand and to analyze the meaning of what others say."},{"kural number": 647, "english mk translation": "No one can defeat someone who is eloquent, tireless, and fearless."},{"kural number": 648, "english mk translation": "People will readily fulfill the tasks assigned by those who can speak eloquently and persuasively."},{"kural
